sentences.sContent: Father doctored me for ordinary stomachache.
sentences.sCn: 父亲为我治疗一般的胃痛。

sentences.sContent: A fever can also affect sleep and dreams, as can a stomachache, which is why some people believe spicy foods or eating right before bed causes wild dreams.
sentences.sCn: 发烧也能影响睡眠和做梦，胃痛也如此，这就是为什么有人相信睡前吃了辛辣的食物会做噩梦。

trans.tranOther: pain in your stomach or near your stomach
